name: Gram Seva Trust
briefDescription: Gram Seva Trust is not for profit Organization. Working for poor tribal people at Kharel- rural area of south Gujarat since 15 years. We have one hospital providing medical care tomore than 2 lacs population of surrounding villages of Navsari. Dang District. We havecommunity health of development programme in 24 villages comprising of 50.000 populations.The organization is having Child health & Nutrition proiect taking care of 3000 children ofvillages for health & malnutrition. The organisation is also working for women empowermentthrough project of vocational training & SHG groups ( 106 of 1200 women) It also providesmedical care to interior area of Dang district(Forest Area) bv satellite centres & medical camp.
